name: Princess Fairy Tale Dress Up Fashion Designer Pop Games Free for Girls
name_original: Princess Fairy Tale Dress Up Fashion Designer Pop Games Free for Girls
description:
The peace and beautiful of the wonderful land far far away call Frozen Wonderland which covered with a beautiful sheet of snow everywhere. In frozen castle at far away land, there lived king Robert II who had eight beautiful daughters; Jenifer, Victoria, Gisele, Anne, Kim, Angelina, Charlize and Olivia.

All beautiful princesses slept in eight beds all in one room; and when they went to bed, the doors were shut and locked up. Surprisingly, every morning their shoes were found to be quite worn through as if they had been danced in all night; and yet nobody could find out how it happened, or where they had been.

Then the great king Robert II made it known to all the land, that if anyone could find out where it was that the princesses danced in the night, he should have the one he liked best for his wife.

If you really want to find out where it is that the princesses dance, get your groove on with the fabulous style. Create the most beautiful princess with the most outstanding outfits, accessories and everything!

Choose the most beautiful princess, lovely hairstyles, fabulous dresses, cute modest outfits, spark jewelry pieces, fashionable shoes, chic groves and do not forget to add beautiful magic masks. The mysterious masks can turn the princess into a super dancer using magic masks!

This game encourage creativity, that’s why our game has a social sharing faction. You can share your friends know how great your fashionable sense by sharing it on social media like Facebook etc.

Let's help them pick out the costume and everything and follow them tonight

What are you waiting for? Download and Play Now!
